title: Critical Thinking Enhancement Course in EFL Writing Education Using Online Asynchronous Discussion

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level English writing proficiency and comprehension of academic topics
context.additional_context: Social studies topics applicable to real-world professional contexts (medical/legal/technical)

learning_goals: Learners can achieve critical thinking levels (analysis, evaluation, creation) of three or more stages through English argumentative writing in asynchronous online discussion environments
Learners can enhance evidence-based logical structuring skills by writing arguments for/against academic and professional topics
Learners can improve logical coherence in writing by revising drafts three or more times incorporating peer feedback
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
